character.description: Andrew Fork was a commodore of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance] who was notable for his part in the Alliance invasion of Imperial territory in mid-796 UC. He was also involved (albeit briefly) in the plot to assassinate http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli] in 800 UC. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Jochen von Remscheid
character.description: Jochen von Remscheid was a former Imperial High Commissioner to http://anidb.net/ch6233 [Phezzan] who established himself as the prime minister of the http://anidb.net/ch6226 [`legitimate` government-in-exile] on Heinessen. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Konev
character.description: Vice Admiral Konev was the Operations Staff Officer for the Alliance`s invasion of the Galactic Empire in SC 798. No relation to either http://anidb.net/ch269 [Boris] or http://anidb.net/ch781 [Ivan] Konev.

character.name: Birolinen
character.description: Rear Admiral Borainen was the Information Chief of Staff for the Alliance`s invasion of the Galactic Empire in SC 798.

character.name: Lefebvre
character.description: Lefebvre was an Alliance vice admiral who commanded the 3rd Fleet by 796 UC, from the battleship http://anidb.net/ch82271 [Cu Chulainn]. That year, he took part in the invasion of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] and fought at the battle of Lesing against the fleet of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch188 [August Samuel Wahlen]. Lefebvre was killed in action when the Cu Chulainn was destroyed, along with most of the 3rd Fleet. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Alexandre Bewcock
character.description: Alexandre Bewcock was an officer in the Free Planets Star Fleet, and a friend/mentor to http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]. Alexandre Bewcock served as a commander in the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] Star Fleet for more than four decades, and was considered to be one of the most experienced fleet commanders in the galaxy at the time of the Alliance–Imperial War. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Hoghwood
character.description: Hoghwood was an http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] vice admiral and commander of the 7th Fleet. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Appleton
character.description: Vice Admiral Appleton was the commander of the 8th Fleet. Went down with his flagship, the http://anidb.net/ch82270 [Krishna], at the Battle of Amritsar Starzone, in battle with http://anidb.net/ch191 [Bittenfeld]`s Black Lancers.

character.name: Al Salem
character.description: Vice Admiral al-Salem was the commander of the 9th Fleet. His flagship was the http://anidb.net/ch82272 [Palamedes].

character.name: Ulanfu
character.description: Vice Admiral Ulanfu was the commander of the 10th Fleet. Died when his ship, the http://anidb.net/ch82273 [Bang-goo], was blown up in battle with http://anidb.net/ch191 [Bittenfeld]`s Black Lancers near the planet Lugen, shortly before the decisive Battle of Amritsar Starzone. Encircled by the Lancers, he used his flagship as the rearguard in a breakout operation, managing to save about half of the 10th fleet.

character.name: Borodin
character.description: Vice Admiral Borodin was the commander of the 12th Fleet. He committed suicide after his fleet was practically annihilated by http://anidb.net/ch189 [Lutz] at the Borsorn System prior to the Battle of Amritsar Starzone.

character.name: Ivan Konev
character.description: Ivan Konev was an http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] Spartanian pilot and squadron commander who served under http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Toda
character.description: Toda was an Alliance officer who served under http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli] at the Battle of Jafnhár Starzone and a Spartanian maintenance chief on the http://anidb.net/ch82015 [Hyperion].

character.name: Royal Sanford
character.description: Royal Sanford was the Chairman of the Alliance High Council.

character.name: Connally
character.description: Connally was an Alliance rear admiral and vice commander of the 12th Fleet. When the 12th fleet was practically annihilated by http://anidb.net/ch189 [Lutz] at the Borsorn System prior to the Battle of Amritsar Starzone, he took command after http://anidb.net/ch778 [Borodin]`s suicide and surrendered to Lutz.

character.name: Chan
character.description: 10th fleet chief of staff to http://anidb.net/ch777 [Vice Admiral Ulanfu].

character.name: Franz Valleymunt
character.description: Ensign Franz Valleymunt served as part of the Alliance 7th fleet. He was trained as a botanist and an engineer in addition to his military service.

character.name: Therese Wagner
character.description: Therese Wagner was a civilian who lived on an unnamed Imperial frontier planet during its invasion by the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance] in 796 UC. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Fyodor Patorichev
character.description: Fyodor Patorichev was an http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] commodore. He served in the 13th Fleet under the command of Admiral http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]. He was with the fleet from the very beginning, participating in the capture of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] in the Seventh Battle of Iserlohn. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Ehrenberg
character.description: Ehrenberg was an http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Imperial] Fleet Admiral and one of three military Chiefs of Staff under Kaiser http://anidb.net/ch206 [Friedrich IV]. By the time of the Lippstadt Rebellion, he was presumably forced to retire. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Steinhof
character.description: Steinhof was an http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Imperial] fleet admiral and one of three military chiefs of staff under Kaiser http://anidb.net/ch206 [Friedrich IV]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Pfeiffel
character.description: Pfeiffel was an Alliance lieutenant commander and former adjutant to then Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch773 [Alexandre Bewcock] since at least the Third Battle of Tiamat. He collapsed due to a heart attack in January 799 UC caused by overwork as a result of the Imperial annexation of Phezzan and was replaced by http://anidb.net/ch1044 [Soun Soulszzcuaritter]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Bronze
character.description: Bronze was an Alliance Vice Admiral and the Alliance Fleet`s Chief of Information as of 797 UC. He participated in the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council]`s coup d`état against the Alliance government, and was arrested following the Council`s surrender. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Luglanju
character.description: Commander of the 11th fleet and member of the National Salvation Military Council. Committed suicide following defeat to Yang Wen-li at the Battle of Starzone Doria.

character.name: Evans
character.description: Evans was an http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] captain. He participated in and acted as spokesperson for the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council]`s coup d`état against the Alliance government. Following the Council`s realization that the coup had been instigated by http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm] to distract the Alliance government, and the subsequent death of http://anidb.net/ch750 [Dwight Greenhill], Evans announced the Council`s surrender to http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]. He then committed suicide. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Christian
character.description: Christian was an http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] colonel who supported the coup d`état of 797 UC. Colonel Christian was a member of the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council] and took part in its coup d`état against the Alliance government. Shortly afterwards he was involved in suppressing a peace rally led by http://anidb.net/ch761 [Jessica Edwards] at Heinessen Stadium. Following an argument between the two, Christian began beating Edwards, leading to a massive altercation between the military and assembled citizens. Christian and Edwards were both killed in the ensuing mayhem. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Emil von Reckendorf
character.description: Adjutant to Oskar von Reuental.

character.name: Bagdashu
character.description: Bagdashu was an officer of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance]. Initially aligned with the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council], he later defected to the Alliance forces under http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]. Originally tasked with the assassination of Yang, he leaked false information about the movements of the NSMC http://anidb.net/ch96433 [11th Fleet] but was met with suspicion by http://anidb.net/ch748 [Walter von Schönkopf], who confined him to his tank bed during the Battle of Doria. After the battle, he grudgingly agreed to defect to Yang`s command, but was still distrusted by http://anidb.net/ch742 [Julian Mintz]. Near the end of the Alliance Civil War, Bagdashu gave a speech announcing that the NSMC had undertake the coup under the clandestine directions of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire]. Though Yang lacked physical evidence of the involvement of http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Reinhard von Lohengramm], the speech successfully damaged the morale of the junta, leading to http://anidb.net/ch794 [Arthur Lynch] confirming the existence of an Imperial plot. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Guen van Hugh
character.description: Guen van Hugh was an http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] Rear Admiral who served as a Squadron Commander of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] during its occupation by the Free Planets Alliance. He was killed when his flagship, the http://anidb.net/ch82168 [Maurya], was destroyed by forces under High Admiral http://anidb.net/ch194 [Oskar von Reuenthal] in early 798 UC. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Stocks
character.description: Stocks was an http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] rear admiral and vice commander of the http://anidb.net/ch96433 [11th Fleet]. He participated in the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council]`s coup d`état against the Alliance government, alongside his commander, http://anidb.net/ch800 [Luglanju]. After http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli] refused to take part in the coup, the 11th Fleet mobilized to face the loyalist forces, meeting them in a decisive engagement at the Battle of Doria. Catching the 11th off-guard, Yang succeeded in cutting it in half, and http://anidb.net/ch741 [Dusty Attenborough]`s squadron was sent to occupy the forward forces under Stocks. Eventually, the Yang`s forces rejoined Attenborough`s squadron, critically outgunning and outnumbering Stocks` forces. Despite Yang`s repeated offers of surrender, Stocks refused to surrender, and was lost with the rest of the 11th Fleet. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Lao
character.description: Officer on http://anidb.net/ch741 [Dusty Attenborough]`s staff.

character.name: Bay
character.description: Bay was an http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] commodore an a confidante of Chairman http://anidb.net/ch743 [Job Trunicht]. As a captain during the coup d`etat in 797 UC, Bay pretended to support the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council] while keeping Trunicht aware of all of what was happening. Later, he was promoted for his work and acted as Trunicht`s security chief during the government`s inquiry of Admiral http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Konrad von Modell
character.description: Konrad von Modell was the son of Imperial Viscount Modell, and, following the Imperial Civil War, the only surviving member of the Modell family. During the war he was a student who was assigned to http://anidb.net/ch82218 [Garmisch Fortress] as a cabin boy; however, before he began that position, the supply vessel he was on was fired upon by allied ships under the command of http://anidb.net/ch303 [Wilhelm von Littenheim]. He was ultimately rescued by the http://anidb.net/ch187 [Kircheis] Fleet. Following the war, he was taken in by http://anidb.net/ch205 [Annerose von Grünewald]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Konrad Linser
character.description: Konrad Linser was an Imperial commander who served under Admiral http://anidb.net/ch188 [August Samuel Wahlen] during the pacification. During the Imperial Civil War in 797 UC, Linser was a lieutenant who served aboard a supply ship of the Littenheim Fleet, fighting for the http://anidb.net/ch6230 [Lippstadt League]. His allegiance soon changed after he was injured and became one of the few survivors of his ship`s crew, when Marquis http://anidb.net/ch303 [Wilhelm von Littenheim] opened fire on his own vessels because they were in the way. He later presented himself to Admiral http://anidb.net/ch187 [Siegfried Kircheis] and offered to appeal to Littenheim`s troops in http://anidb.net/ch82218 [Garmisch Fortress] to surrender. However, Littenheim was killed in an explosion by http://anidb.net/ch82213 [one of his men] before this could be done. By 799 UC, Linser was serving the New Galactic Empire of Kaiser Reinhard and held the rank of commander. He led the ground troops into the bunkers on Earth during the Empire`s pacification of the http://anidb.net/ch6232 [Terraist Church]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Gutensonne
character.description: Adjutant to Cornelius Lutz.

character.name: Sanders
character.description: Adjutant to Fahrenheit.

character.name: Eihendorf
character.description: Eihendorf was an Imperial Rear Admiral who served under http://anidb.net/ch190 [Karl Gustav Kempf]. He was killed, along with the entirety of his fleet, during the Eighth Battle of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Patolicken
character.description: Patolicken was an Imperial Rear Admiral who served under http://anidb.net/ch190 [Karl Gustav Kempf]. He was killed when his flagship, the http://anidb.net/ch97354 [Langenberg], was destroyed during the Eighth Battle of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Eugen Richter
character.description: A former noble who gave up his rank and title and worked towards the reformation of the autocratic rule of the Goldenbaum dynasty. Later made Minister of Finance by Reinhard, in recognition of the same.

character.name: Oppenheimer
character.description: Count Oppenheimer was an Imperial noble and admiral who served as chief of the military police under Kaiser http://anidb.net/ch206 [Friedrich IV]. During the Imperial Civil War of 797 UC, he sided with the http://anidb.net/ch6230 [Lippstadt Alliance]; he later claimed he hadn`t wished to participate, but was obliged to due to his blood relation to http://anidb.net/ch303 [Wilhelm von Littenheim]. Following the war, http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm] was prepared to give Oppenheimer his previous position back; however, after Oppenheimer attempted to bribe him with a famous Erlemeier painting, Lohengramm had him arrested. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Feldewelt
character.description: Feldewelt was an Imperial Commodore who served under http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm] as his adjutant shortly after the Imperial Civil War. However, since he was unable to perform his duties to Reinhard`s standard, Feldewelt was replaced in the form of a promotion to rear admiral, with his position being taken by http://anidb.net/ch297 [Arthur von Streit]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Degsby
character.description: Degsby was a bishop of the http://anidb.net/ch6232 [Terraist Church] as well as briefly an intermediary between http://anidb.net/t2322 [Phezzani] leader http://anidb.net/ch204 [Adrian Rubinsky]. Towards the end of his life he would become an apostate. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Henslow
character.description: Henslow was the Free Planet Alliance`s high commissioner to Phezzan. He was easily manipulated by Rubinsky into raising suspicion against Yang Wenli. During Phezzan`s occupation by the Imperial fleet, he proved to be indecisive and incapable of independent action, relying on Julian for his escape.

character.name: Negroponty
character.description: Negroponty was an Alliance politician who succeeded http://anidb.net/ch743 [Job Trunicht] as the Secretary of Defence after the latter became the High Council chairman in 796 UC. In April 798 UC, he presided the hearings against http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]`s actions during the liberation of Heinessen from the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council]. As the hearings were conducted around the same time the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Empire] invaded http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] in the Eighth Battle of Iserlohn, Negroponty took responsibility for summoning Yang from Iserlohn and resigned as a result. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Yang Tailong
character.description: Yang Tailong was the father of http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli] and a citizen of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance]. He worked as an interstellar trader, frequently traveling between Heinessen and Phezzan, alongside his young son. A committed capitalist, Tailong believed that it was the duty of the people to accumulate wealth, because money was power and only with money could they keep the politicians in check. He died in 783 UC. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Henrique Martino Borges de Arantes e Oliveira
character.description: Died in the Rugpool Prison political prisoner riots

character.name: Fields
character.description: Navigation officer aboard the Ulysses.

character.name: Walter Islands
character.description: Walter Islands was an http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] politician who briefly served as the Secretary of Defense before the end of the Alliance–Imperial War in May 799 UC. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Drewentz
character.description: Drewentz was an Imperial Lieutenant who served under http://anidb.net/ch236 [Neithardt Müller]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Olrau
character.description: Orlau was an Imperial Commodore who served under http://anidb.net/ch236 [Neithardt Müller]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Lionel Mouton
character.description: Deputy commander of the 5th Fleet.

character.name: Sandle Alarcon
character.description: Sandle Alarcon was an Alliance Rear Admiral. He was killed following the Eighth Battle of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn], when his and Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch808 [Guen]`s fleets were destroyed in pursuit of the retreating Imperial survivors. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Pletweri
character.description: Pletweri was a Phezzani diplomat who served as the dominion`s high commissioner posted on Heinessen, reponsible for lobbying and outright bribery. The merchant ship captain http://anidb.net/ch269 [Boris Konev] served as his secretary for some time. He was seen packing up documents at the High Commission after Phezzan was occupied by the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire], but what happened to him afterwards is unknown. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Molt
character.description: Molt was an Imperial vice admiral who served as head of security at Neue Sanssouci by 798 UC. Feeling responsible after the abduction of Kaiser http://anidb.net/ch225 [Erwin Josef II] by http://anidb.net/ch210 [Alfred von Lansberg] and http://anidb.net/ch209 [Leopold Schumacher], he committed suicide. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Raabenardt
character.description: Raabenardt was a butler who served Imperial Fleet Admiral http://anidb.net/ch195 [Paul von Oberstein]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Bomel
character.description: Bomel was the captain of the http://anidb.net/t2322 [Phezzani] ship http://anidb.net/ch100926 [Rocinante], which carried http://anidb.net/ch225 [Erwin Josef II] and his caretakers to Heinessen in 798 UC. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Viola
character.description: Julian Mintz`s superior during his time on Phezzan.

character.name: Katherine I
character.description: The thirty-eight and final Kaiserine of the Goldenbaum dynasty. Briefly held the position despite being only 8 months old before being succeeded by Reinhard von Lohengramm.

character.name: Rudolf von Goldenbaum
character.description: Founder of the Galactic Empire.

character.name: D. Sinclair
character.description: Historian specialising in modern history.

character.name: E.A. Mackenzie
character.description: Historian specialising in ideological history.

character.name: Magdalena
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch1019 [Rudolf von Goldenbaum]`s mistress in his later years. She bore him his only male progeny, but the child was born with congenital defects, dealing a heavy blow to his ideas of genetic and racial purity. Because of this, all traces of the birth, down to the attending doctors and nurses, were erased from history.

character.name: Sigissmunt I
character.description: The second Kaiser of the Galactic Empire.

character.name: Ale Heinessen
character.description: Spiritual founder of the Free Planets Alliance.

character.name: Friedrich III
character.description: The twentieth Kaiser of the Galactic Empire at the time of the discovery of the Free Planets Alliance in SC 640.

character.name: Herbert
character.description: Unsuccessfully waged the first military campaign against the Free Planets Alliance.

character.name: Leopold Laap
character.description: First Landesherr of Phezzan.

character.name: Glaesar
character.description: Mittermeyer`s landing forces commander.

character.name: Ralf Carlsen
character.description: Commander of the 14th Fleet.

character.name: Sebastian von Musel
character.description: Following the death of his wife Claribel, he embarked on a path of drinking and depression, including the sale of his daughter Annerose to Kaiser Friedrich IV, for which his son Reinhard never forgave him.

character.name: Emil von Secla
character.description: His father was a surgeon of the cruise ship, killed in the Battle of Amlitzer. Recruited by Hildegard von Mariendorf as Reinhard von Lohengramm`s personal attendant.

character.name: Xaniel
character.description: Alliance officer serving under http://anidb.net/ch773 [Admiral Bucock]. Held the rank of Commodore during the First Battle of Rantemario, was promoted to Read Admiral by the time of the Battle of Starzone Marr-Adetta. His flagship is the http://anidb.net/ch82024 [Belenus].

character.name: Marinetti
character.description: Alliance officer serving under http://anidb.net/ch773 [Admiral Bucock]. Held the rank of Commodore during the First Battle of Rantemario, was promoted to Read Admiral by the time of the Battle of Starzone Marr-Adetta. His flagship is the http://anidb.net/ch82026 [Rustam].

character.name: Grobner
character.description: Chief of Staff for the Black Lancers.

character.name: Buxtehude
character.description: Adjutant to Fahrenheit.

character.name: Dirxen
character.description: Adjutant to Bittenfeld.

character.name: Neissebach
character.description: Adjutant to Steinmetz.

character.name: Aubry Cockrane
character.description: Commander of the Alliance Laguna Supply Base.

character.name: Winslow Kennes Townshent
character.description: Accountant and secretary of a labour union, Fired on by a drunken Earth forces soldier, framed for the murder of his mother and subsequently became a fugitive. Logistics for the Black Flag Force.

character.name: Carle Palmgren
character.description: Reporter attacked by the Earth forces. Leader of the Black Flag Force and first leader of the Sirius Government.

character.name: Joliot Frankul
character.description: Studied botany at school, but became a fugitive when he beat an Earth soldier to death. Field Commander of the Black Flag Force.

character.name: Chao Yuilung
character.description: Studied composition at a music academy. Parents were killed by the Earth forces.

character.name: Werner
character.description: Adjutant to Ulrich Kesler.

character.name: Laft
character.description: Responsible for the suppression of Terraists during the Kunmel incident.

character.name: Elfriede von Kohlrausch
character.description: Last remaining heir to the Lichtenlade family.

character.name: Godwin
character.description: Terraism agent on Odin. Responsible for planning the failed assassination attempt on Reinhard von Lohengramm. Captured and committed suicide in custody.

character.name: Richard I
character.description: The third Kaiser of the Goldenbaum Dynasty.

character.name: Ottofried I
character.description: The fourth Kaiser of the Goldenbaum Dynasty. He despised change above all else, living to a very rigid schedule.

character.name: Eckhart
character.description: Imperial Secretary of State, ran the government during the rule of Ottofried I. Failed in assassination attempt on his successor Kaspar I after being rebuffed for the marriage of his daughter.

character.name: Kaspar I
character.description: The fifth Kaiser, and homosexual much to the embarrassment of Rudolf von Goldenbaum.

character.name: Julius I
character.description: The sixth Kaiser of the Goldenbaum Dynasty. Poisoned in a plot by his grandson following his prolonged rule and refusal to abdicate.

character.name: Karl
character.description: Former heir ousted from the royal family following discovery of his guilt in the assassination of Julius I.

character.name: Sigissmunt II
character.description: 7th Kaiser of the Goldenbaum dynasty. Succeeded to the throne following the expulsion of Karl, his cousin.

character.name: Wenzel von Hasselback
character.description: Grand Chamberlain to Reinhard von Lohengramm.

character.name: Ratzel
character.description: Responsible for surveillance of Yang Wen-li`s movements on Heinessen.

character.name: Kleiber
character.description: Adjutant to Samuel Wahlen.

character.name: Leiwul
character.description: Adjutant to Samuel Wahlen.

character.name: Hauff
character.description: Adjutant to Wahlen.

character.name: Gluck
character.description: Vice Minister of Civil Engineering.

character.name: Wagenseil
character.description: Admiral Wagenseil`s fleet was to form part of the middle section of Kaiser Reinhard`s fleet deployment in http://anidb.net/e12097 [Operation Ragnarok II], along with the http://anidb.net/ch1358 [Grotewohl], http://anidb.net/ch1359 [Meivoher] and http://anidb.net/ch1360 [Kurlich] fleets. He was later thoroughly outwitted by Julian in a http://anidb.net/e12129 [skirmish] on the Imperial end of the Iserlohn Corridor

character.name: Grotewohl
character.description: Admiral Grotewohl`s fleet was to form part of the middle section of Kaiser Reinhard`s fleet deployment in http://anidb.net/e12097 [Operation Ragnarok II], along with the http://anidb.net/ch1357 [Wagenseil], http://anidb.net/ch1359 [Meivoher] and http://anidb.net/ch1360 [Kurlich] fleets.

character.name: Meivoher
character.description: Vice Admiral Meivoher`s fleet was to form part of the middle section of Kaiser Reinhard`s fleet deployment in http://anidb.net/e12097 [Operation Ragnarok II], along with the http://anidb.net/ch1358 [Grotewohl], http://anidb.net/ch1357 [Wagenseil] and http://anidb.net/ch1360 [Kurlich] fleets.

character.name: Kurlich
character.description: Vice Admiral Kurlich`s fleet was to form part of the middle section of Kaiser Reinhard`s fleet deployment in http://anidb.net/e12097 [Operation Ragnarok II], along with the http://anidb.net/ch1358 [Grotewohl], http://anidb.net/ch1357 [Wagenseil] and http://anidb.net/ch1359 [Meivoher] fleets.

character.name: Baunsgaard
character.description: Engineering Vice-Admiral of the Planet Losiana ship construction facility.

character.name: Siegbert Seidlitz
character.description: Captain of the Brünhild.

character.name: Otto Wahler
character.description: Committed suicide following the loss of control of Iserlohn Fortress to the Alliance forces.

character.name: Claude Montaigne
character.description: Director of Finance and Treasury Board Secretariat.

character.name: Brentahno
character.description: Deputy military police commissioner, responsible for the suppression of the PKC.

character.name: Server
character.description: Adjutant to Steinmetz.

character.name: Bolenz
character.description: Chief of Staff to Steinmetz.

character.name: Ritschl
character.description: Formerly the Fleet Secretary of Steinmetz`s fleet when it was based out of the Gandharva system. Due to his knowledge of the affairs of former Alliance territories, he was later appointed Vice Inspector General of Neue Lande, under Reuenthal.

character.name: Julius Elsheimer
character.description: Civil Affairs Minister in Neue Land and husband to Cornelius Lutz`s sister. Refused to participate in the Reuental rebellion during which he was placed under house arrest.

character.name: Jurgens
character.description: Deputy chief of the royal guards.

character.name: Alfred Alois Winckler
character.description: Urvasi Base Commander, in charge of 500,000 men. Later discovered to be suffering from drug addiction.

character.name: Vonk
character.description: Vice Admiral Vonk was adjutant to http://anidb.net/ch1357 [Admiral Wagenseil].

character.name: Griess
character.description: Adjutant to Ernst von Eisenach.

character.name: Gerlach
character.description: Viscount Gerlach was the Minister of Finance of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] during the reign of http://anidb.net/ch206 [Friedrich IV]. After the fall of the Goldenbaum Dynasty, he was replaced by http://anidb.net/ch822 [Eugen Richter] as the finance minister. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Matt Hefer
character.description: Navigator aboard the Brunhild.

character.name: Kurt Zingufuber
character.description: Brünhild crew member. Dealt the fatal blow to Walter von Schenkopf.

character.name: Pegnitz
character.description: Count having family ties to the former Kiaser Ludwig III, and grandfather to Kaiserine Katherine I. Has an expensive taste for ivory.

character.name: Moore
character.description: Vice Admiral Moore was the commander of the 6th Fleet. He was killed in the http://anidb.net/e7160 [Battle of Astarte] when his flagship, the http://anidb.net/ch82367 [Pergamonn], was lost in combat.

character.name: Pastoll
character.description: Vice Admiral Pastolle was the commander of the 4th Fleet. He was killed in the http://anidb.net/e7160 [Battle of Astarte] when his flagship, the http://anidb.net/ch82368 [Leonidas], was lost in combat.

character.name: Ottofried V
character.description: The thirty-fifth Kaiser of the Goldenbaum dynasty.

character.name: Salamander
character.description: The Salamander was the Imperial flagship of admiral http://anidb.net/ch188 [August Samuel Wahlen]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Konigs Tiger
character.description: The Königs Tiger was the flagship of Imperial admiral http://anidb.net/ch191 [Fritz Josef Bittenfeld]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Beiowulf
character.description: The Beiowulf was the Imperial flagship of Admiral http://anidb.net/ch193 [Wolfgang Mittermeyer].

character.name: Tristan
character.description: The Tristan was the Imperial flagship of Imperial Admiral http://anidb.net/ch194 [Oskar von Reuenthal]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Barbarossa
character.description: The Barbarossa was the Imperial flagship of http://anidb.net/ch187 [Siegfried Kircheis].

character.name: Ginga Teikoku
character.description: In the http://anidb.net/a584 [Legend of Galactic Heroes] universe, the Galactic Empire, also known as the Empire, is a nation with a feudalistic system and an aristocratic government based on the planet Odin, forged by http://anidb.net/ch1019 [Rudolf von Goldenbaum] and ruled with an iron fist by the Goldenbaum Dynasty and its nobles for centuries. The Empire was originally forged as its precursor, the Galactic Federation, decayed and its people looked for a hero-like politician to guide them; Rudolf, who was a very charismatic leader, fit the bill perfectly, and was also very power-hungry; he jumped at the opportunity, took all power into his hands, dissolved the Federation into a new Empire, and named himself the Kaiser. Eventually, refugees under the leadership of http://anidb.net/ch1026 [Ale Heinessen] would flee the oppression and form what became known as the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance], but the Alliance was discovered and attacked as rebels, and subsequently waged a seemingly endless war to a stalemate. As one might expect, nobles can be either born with that status or granted it, and that one of the lead characters would be made into a noble is a key plot point in the story. After almost 160 years of war and many centuries of bad government, http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm] would take advantage of his military prowess to garner allies and power, even more so during the civil war that followed the death of http://anidb.net/ch206 [Kaiser Friedrich IV]. Soon afterwards, Reinhard would use that power in his favor to depose the Goldenbaum dynasty entirely, seizing power to himself and thus founding the Lohengramm Dynasty, also referred to as the New Galactic Empire. Under Reinhard`s leadership, the Empire would undergo drastic reforms; he revoked the privileges of nobles, seized control of the then-autonomous planet http://anidb.net/ch6233 [Phezzan], moved the government to it, started a new calendar, and did many other things that caused the horror of the former aristocracy, causing many nobles to unsuccessfully try to stop him. He soon also conquered the Alliance and imposed a harsh peace treaty, and after a revolt also annexed it altogether. After his death, his wife http://anidb.net/ch199 [Hildegard von Mariendorf] would lead the Galactic Empire into maturity, eventually changing it into a constitutional monarchy, as his highly respected, long-time rival, Alliance admiral http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wen-li] would have argued for.

character.name: Jiyuu Wakusei Doumei
character.description: In the http://anidb.net/a584 [Legend of Galactic Heroes] universe, the Free Planets Alliance, also known as the Alliance or the FPA, is a nation with a democratic government based on the planet Heinessen. During its history, it eventually grew to occupy the Sagittarius Arm of the Milky Way galaxy, and became one of the two centres of human civilization in the galaxy. It was founded by refugees who fled the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] under the leadership of http://anidb.net/ch1026 [Ale Heinessen], but was discovered and attacked, and subsequently waged a seemingly endless war to a stalemate. For several reasons, after almost 160 years of war, the military situation in the Alliance rapidly deteriorated in comparison to the Empire and the war stalemate soon became a massive one-sided victory. The peace treaty imposed by http://anidb.net/ch186 [the Emperor] was very harsh, and the Imperial interference soon led to uprising, which was then used by the Emperor to again declare war. This new war would end in only a few months and lead to the complete dissolution of the Alliance.

character.name: Reinhard von Musel
character.description: Reinhard was born into a poor noble family. He lived with his father and his older sister Annerose. His mother died when he was young so he knew very little about her. When Reinhard moved to a middle class suburban neighborhood, he met Siegfried Kircheis and they soon became inseparable friends. When his father sold Annerose to become Kaiser Friedrich IV`s concubine, Reinhard swore that he would overthrow the Goldenbaum dynasty to rescue his older sister. He left school to join the military academy and persuaded Kircheis to come along with him.

character.name: Ostmark
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch303 [Marquis Littenheim]`s flagship. Same class as the http://anidb.net/ch82215 [Berlin] and the http://anidb.net/ch82216 [Wilhelmina], equipped with a pair of shield ships, similar to the Berlin.

character.name: Lubeck
character.description: The Lübeck was the Imperial flagship of Admiral http://anidb.net/ch236 [Neithardt Müller].

character.name: Vonkel
character.description:
The Vonkel was http://anidb.net/ch237 [High Admiral Karl Robert Steinmetz]`s flagship.
At the Battle of the Iserlohn Corridor, it was sunk with all hands but one in action against http://anidb.net/ch791 [Marino]`s assault force, the only survivor being Admiral Markgraf, who reported the passing of his commander.

character.name: Geiersberg Yousai
character.description: An artificial sphere 45km in diameter and weighing 40 trillion tonnes, Geiersberg (Vulture`s Castle) was an Imperial fortress in the same class as http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn], though smaller in magnitude. Its primary armament, the Geiers Haken (ガイエスハーケン, Vulture`s Claw) was an X-ray beam cannon with a wavelength of 100 angstroms and a total power output of 740,000,000 MW, comparable to Iserlohn`s Thor Hammer. Its hangars could berth a fleet of 16,000 ships. The surface was composed of alloys, ceramic and hydro-metal. Due to the gradual sublimation of some of the fluid metal over the course of the years since its construction, the surface had acquired a skeletal appearance, with various "pools" or "lakes" of fluid metal. One of these was thought to resemble a vulture, leading to the fortress acquiring its fanciful name. It was used by the high nobles as their headquarters during the Lippstadt Rebellion. It was later augmented with 12 warp engines, as per http://anidb.net/ch218 [Admiral Schaft]`s plan, allowing it to warp into the Iserlohn Corridor and mount an assault on Iserlohn. For this operation, it was placed under the command of http://anidb.net/ch190 [Admiral Kempf].

character.name: Iserlohn Yousai
character.description: Iserlohn Fortress was an Imperial fortress located near the Tiamat Starzone. Existing within the eponymously named Iserlohn Corridor, one of only two navigable star routes between the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Empire] and the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance] (the other being the http://anidb.net/ch6233 [Phezzan] Corridor), Iserlohn kept the territories of the Galactic Empire safe from Alliance invasion. The fortress had a diameter of 60 kilometres and a mass of nearly 60 trillion tonnes. Its primary weapon was an enormous X-ray beam cannon, the Thor Hammer, which was capable of destroying large numbers of enemy vessels in a single shot. Its docks could berth 20,000 ships, and its dedicated agriculture blocks could sustain both a garrison of up to 2 million and a civilian population of up to 3 million indefinitely. The fortress exterior was a several-layer-thick coating of liquid hydro-metal, which absorbed solid projectiles and reflected directed energy; hundreds of cannon turrets floated in this liquid and would rise to fire at approaching enemies. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Kucrain
character.description: Droisen fleet flagship.

character.name: Vissarr
character.description: Eisenach fleet flagship.

character.name: Kvasir
character.description: Flagship of Mecklinger`s Fleet.

character.name: Jotunheim
character.description: The Jotunheim was the Imperial flagship of admiral http://anidb.net/ch190 [Karl Gustav Kempff].

character.name: Theodoricus
character.description: The Theodoricus was http://anidb.net/ch1035 [Vice Admiral Isaak Fernand von Thurneysen]`s flagship.

character.name: Forseti
character.description: Flagship of http://anidb.net/ch208 [Kesler]`s fleet. The lead ship of the Forseti-class, the other ships in the class being the http://anidb.net/ch1755 [Skirnir] and the http://anidb.net/ch1490 [Salamander]. Forseti was a god of justice and reconciliation in the Norse pantheon.

character.name: Rosen Ritter
character.description: The Rosen Ritter was an infantry assault regiment composed entirely of Imperial deserters, refugees, exiles and their children. While unmatched in their combat capability, a question mark always hung over where their true allegiance lay -- a valid question, given that six of their twelve previous commanders had deserted back to the Empire.

character.name: Kyuukoku Gunjikaigi
character.description: The National Salvation Military Council, abbreviated as NSMC, was the name of the military government that seized control of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance] on 3 April 797 UC, during the Alliance Civil War. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Ginga Teikoku Seitou Seifu
character.description: The Galactic Empire Legitimate Government was a government-in-exile formed on Heinessen in August 798 UC, after the Imperial Civil War, with the goal of opposing http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm]`s rule in the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] and restoring the power of the Goldenbaum Dynasty. It was led by Prime Minister http://anidb.net/ch768 [Jochen von Remscheid], the former Imperial high commissioner on http://anidb.net/ch6233 [Phezzan], and also had the young Emperor http://anidb.net/ch225 [Erwin Josef II] as the source of their self-proclaimed legitimacy. Their regime consisted of many former http://anidb.net/ch6230 [Lippstadt League] supporters and other aristocrats. The government`s existence became the casus belli for Reinhard von Lohengramm to declare war on the Alliance and defeat it during Operation Ragnarök, at which point the exiled court was dissolved. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Lippstadt Meiyaku
character.description: The Lippstadt League was a coalition of aristocratic families, led by Duke http://anidb.net/ch261 [Otto von Braunschweig], who revolted against the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] in the Imperial Civil War. They claimed legitimacy in the name of protecting the Goldenbaum Dynasty against usurpers. Their main headquarters was http://anidb.net/ch1760 [Geiersberg Fortress], the single strongest fortress left in the Empire after the loss of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] to the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance]. A total of 3,760 nobles joined, and the total number of armed men was 25.6 million. Its total fleet strength numbered approximately 150,000 ships. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Saikou Hyougikai
character.description: The 11-member High Council was the highest governing body of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance].

character.name: Terraism
character.description: The Terraist Church, more commonly referred to as Terraism, was an extra-national religious organization, operated like a cult, which advocated the re-establishment of the planet Terra as the center of human civilization. Its symbol consisted of two crossed olive branches framing a symbol for Earth: the sun cross (cross within a circle). Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Phezzan Jichiryou
character.description: The Dominion of Phezzan was an autonomous region within the http://anidb.net/ch95944 [Galactic Empire], a planet-state within the Phezzan Corridor, which was able to serve as a neutral party in the Alliance–Imperial War by facilitating trade between the Empire and http://anidb.net/ch95945 [Free Planets Alliance]. By the reign of Kaiser http://anidb.net/ch206 [Friedrich IV], the Dominion of Phezzan had become an economic superpower. Its flag was the two headed eagle crest of the Goldenbaum Dynasty rendered in silver, over a yellow triangle and black background. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Undutiness
character.description: After the destruction of the http://anidb.net/ch82028 [Beryoska], http://anidb.net/ch269 [Boris Konev] was left without a ship. In the confusion of the events following the Battle of Vermilion, http://anidb.net/ch745 [Alex Cazellnu] arranged for a brand-new Alliance vessel to be listed as decommissioned, while actually being given to Boris. Christened the "Undutiness" at http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang]`s suggestion, this was the vessel used by http://anidb.net/ch742 [Julian] on his trip to Earth -- the name being Yang`s joke, as Julian was effectively neglecting his duties towards his "parent". The same vessel was used by Boris to bring information to http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn] about the plot on Yang`s life, and the news of http://anidb.net/ch194 [Reuenthal]`s rebellion

character.name: Triglav
character.description: The Triglav was an http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] warship that served as a flagship for Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch741 [Dusty Attenborough]. The Triglav served as a squadron flagship, joining the http://anidb.net/ch96406 [Yang Fleet] at its formation in late 796 UC. Its first battle was against the 11th Fleet in the Battle of Doria, where Commodore Attenborough`s squadron drew the squadron of Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch809 [Stocks] away from the rest of the http://anidb.net/ch96433 [11th Fleet]. The Triglav was next engaged in a small, inconclusive battle with the fleet of Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch816 [Eihendorf], part of the http://anidb.net/ch190 [Kempff] Fleet, in 798 UC, whilst it was on a training cruise. Later that year, it defended http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] at the Eighth Battle of Iserlohn, and again in the Ninth Battle of Iserlohn, when High Admiral http://anidb.net/ch194 [Oskar von Reuenthal] attacked the fortress as part of Operation Ragnarok from late 798 UC to early 799 UC. Joining the rest of the Yang Fleet in evacuating the fortress, the Triglav fought in the subsequent battles of the war leading up to the Battle of Vermilion in 799 UC. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Hyperion
character.description: The Hyperion was the flagship of http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli] throughout his career in the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] military, and, later, the flagship of High Admiral http://anidb.net/ch202 [Willibald Joachim von Merkatz]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Airget lamh
character.description: The Airget lamh was the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] flagship of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch751 [Edwin Fischer]. Pennant number BG-20. The Airget lamh served as a squadron flagship, and was part of the http://anidb.net/ch96406 [Yang Fleet] by 796 UC. It engaged the 11th Fleet in the Battle of Doria, where Commodore Fischer`s squadron participated in the encirclement of the http://anidb.net/ch96433 [11th Fleet]. In 798 UC, it defended http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] at the Eighth Battle of Iserlohn, and again in the Ninth Battle of Iserlohn when High Admiral http://anidb.net/ch194 [Reuenthal] attacked the fortress as part of Operation Ragnarok from late 798 UC to early 799 UC. Joining the rest of the Yang Fleet in evacuating the fortress, the Airget lamh fought in the subsequent battles of the war leading up to the Battle of Vermilion in 799 UC. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Leda II
character.description: The Leda II was an Alliance cruiser which was notable for being the ship that http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli] died on. The Leda II`s first notable mission was as the ship that Admiral Yang Wenli chose to travel with from http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] to Heinessen in 798 UC, for an extra-legal `inquiry`. When the Imperial fleet and http://anidb.net/ch1760 [Geiersberg Fortress] attacked Iserlohn in Yang`s absence, the Leda II took him back, serving as flagship of the small fleet of 5000 ships sent as reinforcements. In the ensuing battle, the Leda II was struck by enemy fire, but its shields held. In July 799 UC, the Leda II also ferried Fleet Admiral Yang and his comrades off of Heinessen. The Leda II eventually became part of the El Facil Revolutionary Reserve Force, which fought the combined fleets of Kaiser http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard] at the Battle of the Corridor in 800 UC. When a truce was called and the Kaiser invited Yang for talks, Yang once again elected to take the Leda II. Representatives from the El Facil Revolutionary Government also attended. A Terraist ploy resulted in the ship being boarded by Terraist-controlled Imperial destroyers en route, and a slaughter ensued as the assassins hunted for Yang. With Yang`s subordinates having been informed of the threat to his life soon after the Leda II`s departure, the flagship http://anidb.net/ch82027 [Ulysses] managed to catch up to the Leda II`s position. http://anidb.net/ch742 [Julian Mintz] and the http://anidb.net/ch6224 [Rosen Ritter] were too late, and Yang was assassinated. The Leda II was then evacuated. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Belenus
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch1065 [Commodore (later Rear Admiral) Xaniel]`s flagship at the First Battle of Rantemario. Pennant number 609R. Named after a Celtic sun god.

character.name: Rio Grande
character.description: The Rio Grande was the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] flagship of http://anidb.net/ch773 [Alexandre Bewcock] and a part of the 5th Fleet.

character.name: Rustam
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch1066 [Commodore (later Read Admiral) Marinetti]`s flagship during the First Battle of Rantemario. Pennant number 205N. Named after Rustam, the hero of the Persian epic, Shahnameh.

character.name: Ulysses
character.description: The Ulysses was an Alliance battleship endowed with the contrasting attributes of being lucky (since it tended to survive battles with little damage) while at the same time drawing enemy attention (often being the first ship to come into contact with an enemy fleet). Served as http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]`s flagship after http://anidb.net/ch202 [Admiral Merkatz] took command of the http://anidb.net/ch82015 [Hyperion]. Pennant number 913-D.

character.name: Klapf
character.description: Brigadier general in Mittermeyer`s fleet. Responsible for securing Phezzan`s Space Navigation Bureau during the occupation of Phezzan.

character.name: Diomedes
character.description: 15th fleet flagship, under the command of http://anidb.net/ch1038 [Vice Admiral Ralf Carlsen]. Destroyed with all hands at the Battle of Marr-Adetta.

character.name: Reinhard (Younen)
character.description: Reinhard von Musel (later von Lohengramm) as a child.

character.name: Strauss
character.description: Admiral Strauss was the Fleet Chief of Staff of Mecklinger`s fleet.

character.name: Masasoite
character.description: The Masasoite was http://anidb.net/ch741 [Dusty Attenborough]`s flagship during the http://anidb.net/e12136 [Battle] of the http://anidb.net/e12150 [Iserlohn] http://anidb.net/e12144 [Corridor] and the Battle of Shiva Starzone. Pennant number 115I.

character.name: Shigyaku Misuihan
character.description: Soldier who attempts to assassinate Kaiser Reinhard at the Phezzan War Cemetery as vengeance for his family that perished in the thermonuclear bombing of Westerland during the Lippstadt Rebellion. The Westerland incident was particularly sensitive for Reinhard, given that he had failed to prevent the attack despite knowing of it, and was later taken to task by Siegfried Kircheis for this sin of omission. Thrown into emotional turmoil by the assassins taunting and cutting barbs, he seeks comfort in Hilda`s arms and ends up sleeping with her. This in turn leads to his marriage proposal to her and the eventual birth of Alexander.

character.name: Kempf no Chounan
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch190 [Admiral Kempf]`s elder son.

character.name: Marduk
character.description: The Marduk was the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] flagship of Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch901 [Sandle Alarcon]. Pennant number 813C. The Marduk accompanied the reinforcements led by Admiral http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli] at the Eighth Battle of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn] in 798 UC. Though the Alliance Fleet defeated the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Imperial] forces, both Rear Admirals Alarcon and http://anidb.net/ch808 [Guen van Hugh] took their fleets in pursuit of the Imperial remnants under Admiral http://anidb.net/ch236 [Müller]. However, they were ambushed by the fleets of High Admiral http://anidb.net/ch193 [Mittermeyer] and http://anidb.net/ch194 [Reuenthal]. The Marduk was blown in half, and the front portion of the ship collided with an Alliance cruiser, killing Alarcon. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Maurya
character.description: The Maurya was the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] flagship of Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch808 [Guen van Hugh]. Pennant number E-5. The Maurya served as a squadron flagship, joining the http://anidb.net/ch96406 [Yang Fleet] at its formation in late 796 UC. Its first engagement following this was at the Battle of Doria Starzone, where Commodore Guen`s squadron was instrumental in cutting the http://anidb.net/ch96433 [11th Fleet]`s formation in two. By 798 UC, the Maurya had been repainted with a distinctive `tiger-stripe` livery, and it defended http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] at the Eighth Battle of Iserlohn. Following the Alliance victory, Rear Admirals Guen and http://anidb.net/ch901 [Alarcon] led their respective fleets in pursuit of the withdrawing Imperial forces, intending to eliminate the few remaining ships. However, both fleets were destroyed by Imperial reinforcements — the Maurya itself was sunk by the Reuenthal Fleet. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Lang-fujin
character.description: Heydrich Lang`s wife.

character.name: Sims
character.description: Sergeant charged with guarding Yang during the course of the secret inquiry chaired by Negroponty.

character.name: Yuukoku Kishidan Danchou
character.description: Leader of a gang of Patriotic Knight Corps (PKC) thugs. Attempts an attack on Frederica Greenhill when she seeks out http://anidb.net/ch773 [Admiral Bucock]`s help during the course of the inquiry chaired by http://anidb.net/ch858 [Negroponty]. His attack is foiled by http://anidb.net/ch820 [Mashengo] and by the appearance of Bucock`s staff, including http://anidb.net/ch797 [Pfeiffel].

character.name: Mittermeyer no Haha
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch193 [Wolfgang Mittermeyer]`s mother.

character.name: Mittermeyer no Chichi
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch193 [Wolfgang Mittermeyer]`s father.

character.name: Rauditz
character.description: Lieutenant Colonel of the Wessel sniper battalion serving under http://anidb.net/ch303 [Marquis Littenheim]. Kills the Marquis in a suicide attack at the Garmisch Fortress, leading eventually to the defeat of the Littenheim force and the loss of Garmisch.

character.name: Berlin
character.description: The Berlin was the Imperial flagship of the http://anidb.net/ch6230 [Lippstadt League]`s fleet under Duke http://anidb.net/ch261 [Otto von Braunschweig]. It stayed at the rear of the Lippstadt fleets when they sortied out of http://anidb.net/ch1760 [Geiersberg Fortress] in an ill-fated attempt to defeat the forces of http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm], during the Imperial Civil War in 797 UC. Drawn into a trap, Braunschweig beat a hasty retreat to the fortress, and the Berlin`s shield ships were lost in the process. The Berlin remained under fire and took damage to its rear port hull, before it was rescued by the fleet of High Admiral Merkatz. (LOGH: `Courage and Loyalty`) With the Lippstadt League`s fleet much reduced by the fiasco, and defeat inevitable, Duke Braunschweig sortied the remains of his fleet again soon after, in an attempt to kill Marquis Lohengramm and save the situation. The attack failed, and the Berlin retreated to the fortress once more. The Berlin was presumably captured when Lohengramm`s forces seized the fortress immediately after the battle. It is apparently identical to the http://anidb.net/ch82216 [Wilhelmina] and http://anidb.net/ch1754 [Ostmark] in design. Like the Ostmark, in battle is accompanied by two shield ships which travel in close proximity to the port and starboard side. The Berlin has more than one "set" of these, as it sortied with replacements after its first set of shield ships were destroyed. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Wilhelmina
character.description: The Wilhelmina was the Imperial flagship of Fleet Admiral http://anidb.net/ch200 [Gregor von Mückenberger] and later Baron http://anidb.net/ch254 [Flegel]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Garmisch Yousai
character.description: The Garmisch Fortress was an Imperial fortress. It was used by http://anidb.net/ch6230 [Lippstadt League] forces as the headquarters of Marquis http://anidb.net/ch303 [Littenheim] and his fleet of 50,000 ships. It was captured by forces under High Admiral http://anidb.net/ch187 [Kircheis] during the Imperial Civil War. Garmisch Fortress was a collection of 5 spheres in a row of 3 and a row of 2, with cylindrical connections linking each sphere to adjacent spheres. There was no indication of a main gun on the same scale as the Vulture`s Claw and the Thor Hammer of the http://anidb.net/ch1760 [Geiersburg] and http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn] fortresses respectively. The main fortress command centre was in one of the spheres in the row of 2. The command center`s internal layout was very similar to that of Iserlohn Fortress. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Leonidas II
character.description: The Leonidas II was the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] flagship of the http://anidb.net/ch96433 [11th Fleet] under Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch800 [Luglanju]. It succeeded the Epimetheus as the flagship of the 11th Fleet after it was destroyed at the Third Battle of Tiamat. Vice Admiral Legrange and the rest of the 11th Fleet sided with the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council] in the Alliance Civil War, and sortied from Heinessen to intercept and destroy the http://anidb.net/ch96406 [Yang Fleet]. When the Yang Fleet engaged the 11th Fleet at the Battle of Doria Starzone, the 11th Fleet was annihilated, and the Leonidas II was reduced to a twisted wreck. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Whitty
character.description: Aide-de-campe to http://anidb.net/ch1410 [Admiral Kubersly].

character.name: Krishna
character.description: 8th fleet flagship commanded by http://anidb.net/ch775 [Vice Admiral Appleton]. Pennant number 08 01. Went down with Vice Admiral Appleton at the Battle of Amritsar Starzone, when a hit to the engine room rendered it impossible for it to maintain orbit around the star Amritsar.

character.name: Cu Chulainn
character.description: The Cu Chulainn was the flagship of the Alliance 3rd Fleet under http://anidb.net/ch772 [Vice Admiral Lefebvre]. Pennant number 03 01. Lost in battle with http://anidb.net/ch188 [Wahlen]`s fleet near the planet Lesing.

character.name: Palamedes
character.description: 9th fleet flagship under the command of http://anidb.net/ch776 [Vice Admiral al-Salem]. Damaged in battle with http://anidb.net/ch193 [Mittermeyer]`s forces in the Alweis System shortly before the Battle of Amritsar Starzone. Pennant number 09 01.

character.name: Bang-goo
character.description: 10th fleet flagship commanded by http://anidb.net/ch777 [Vice Admiral Ulanfu]. Pennant number 10 01. Lost in battle with http://anidb.net/ch191 [Bittenfeld]`s Black Lancers at the planet Lugen.

character.name: Perun
character.description: The Perun was the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] flagship of the 12th Fleet under http://anidb.net/ch778 [Vice Admiral Borodin] and later http://anidb.net/ch784 [Rear Admiral Connally].

character.name: Montarque
character.description: Kleingelt family retainer.

character.name: Ein
character.description: Part of Iserlohn`s security detail.

character.name: Lemmler
character.description: Lemmler was an http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Imperial] commander who served as a staff officer at http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] under Admiral http://anidb.net/ch746 [Thoma von Stockhausen]. When the disguised Alliance soldiers arrived at the fortress command center, he insisted on checking their identifications, though ended up being overruled by the admiral. His worry proved correct when http://anidb.net/ch748 [Walter von Schönkopf] took Stockhausen hostage and used him to compel the Imperials to stand down. Lemmler presumably ended up in an Alliance prison camp after Iserlohn was captured. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Yuukoku Kishidan
character.description: The Patriotic Knight Corps (PKC) was a vigilante/terrorist organisation that "purged" any citizens that they deemed to be "treasonous". In reality, they were a private army owing allegiance to http://anidb.net/ch743 [Truniht] and his cronies such as http://anidb.net/ch762 [Togliatti], acting to intimidate, assault and even murder their political opponents. It is revealed later that there are deep connections between the Terraists and the PKC.

character.name: Josei Heishi
character.description: Serves in the Military Official News Bureau.

character.name: Patoroklos
character.description: Patoroklos is the 2nd Fleet flagship under the command of http://anidb.net/ch740 [Vice Admiral Paeta]. Pennant number 02.

character.name: Pergamonn
character.description: 6th fleet flagship under the command of http://anidb.net/ch1411 [Vice Admiral Moore]. Destroyed in combat at the http://anidb.net/e7160 [Battle of Astarte]. Pennant number 06.

character.name: Leonidas
character.description: 4th fleet flagship under the command of http://anidb.net/ch1412 [Vice Admiral Pastolle]. Destroyed in combat at the http://anidb.net/e7160 [Battle of Astarte]. Pennant number 04. Named after the Spartan king who fell at the Battle of Thermopylae.

character.name: Heidenheim
character.description: The Heidenheim was the flagship of Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch215 [Erlache]. It was destroyed by a battleship of the Alliance 2nd Fleet, after Erlache disobeyed High Admiral http://anidb.net/ch186 [Lohengramm]`s orders by attempting to reverse course to face the enemy. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Bremen
character.description: The Bremen was an Imperial cruiser which was captured by the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance]. It was notable for the part it played in the Alliance`s successful capture of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] during the Seventh Battle of Iserlohn. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Kokushoku Yarikihei Kantai
character.description: The Black Lancers were the Imperial Navy fleet under the command of High Admiral http://anidb.net/ch191 [Fritz Josef Bittenfeld], who led it from the http://anidb.net/ch1494 [Königs Tiger]. Rising to prominence during the late Goldenbaum Dynasty, the Black Lancers became infamous for their unmatched aggression and offensive tactics, becoming one of the most well-known fleets under http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm] and possessing a strong esprit de corps. The fleet was also unique in using the fast battleship in place of the standard battleship, which gave the Black Lancers strong offensive power and mobility. The ships of this fleet were painted entirely black except for the Imperial crest and sensor domes on their hulls. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Dai 2 Kantai
character.description: The 2nd Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet, formed some time prior to 795 UC. During the Battle of Astarte, the 2nd Fleet consisted of 15,000 warships under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch740 [Paetta]. During the battle, Paeta was severely injured and forced to give command of the fleet to a staff officer, http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]. Yang subsequently led the 2nd Fleet in a successful counterattack, and was able to withdraw from Astarte with minimal casualties. For his actions while in command of the 2nd Fleet, Yang became a national hero. The surviving remainder of the 2nd Fleet was later incorporated into Yang`s 13th Fleet under the order of http://anidb.net/ch750 [Dwight Greenhill]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Dai 4 Kantai
character.description: The 4th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet, formed some time prior to 745 UC. It played a notable role in the Second Battle of Tiamat under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch77657 [Frederick Jasper], destroying both the Kartenborn Fleet and then the Kosel Fleet. The fleet was dispatched to the front during the Third Battle of Tiamat as part of Alliance reinforcements, but did not arrive until after the battle. Its appearance at the front played a role in the Imperial withdrawal from the Tiamat starzone. During the Battle of Astarte, the 4th Fleet consisted of 12,000 ships under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch1412 [Pastoll]. It was completely routed at Astarte by http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm]`s Imperial Fleet, being outnumbered and separated from its allies. After the battle, the survivors were amalgamated into the newly formed 13th Fleet. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Dai 6 Kantai
character.description: The 6th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet, formed some time prior to 796 UC. This fleet was dispatched to the front during the Third Battle of Tiamat as part of the FPA reinforcements, but did not arrive until after the battle. Its appearance at the front played a role in the Imperial withdrawal from the Tiamat starzone. During the Battle of Astarte, the 6th Fleet consisted of 13,000 warships. It was almost completely destroyed during that engagement by the Imperial Fleet under http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm], as part of his individual attacks against the separated Alliance forces. After the battle, the survivors were amalgamated into the newly formed 13th Fleet. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Dai 13 Kantai
character.description: The 13th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet. Formed shortly after the Battle of Astarte in 796 UC, its command was granted to recently-promoted Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]. The flagship of the 13th Fleet was the http://anidb.net/ch82015 [Hyperion]. Following the Alliance`s devastating defeat at the Battle of Astarte, the 13th fleet was formed out of the survivors of the http://anidb.net/ch96403 [2nd], http://anidb.net/ch96404 [4th] and http://anidb.net/ch96405 [6th] Fleets, supplemented with new-recruits. Composed of both newly constructed warships and vessels still bearing damage from the Astarte fiasco, the 13th Fleet was only about one-half the typical size of a Free Planets Alliance fleet, numbering only 6,400 vessels and 700,000 personnel at its inception. Its original command group included Rear Admiral Yang Wenli as Fleet Commander, Commodore http://anidb.net/ch751 [Edwin Fischer] as Deputy Fleet Commander, Captain http://anidb.net/ch752 [Murai] as Chief of Staff and Commander http://anidb.net/ch793 [Fyodor Patorichev] as Deputy Chief of Staff. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Dai 1 Kantai
character.description: The 1st Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet. In 798 UC it was stationed at the planet Heinessen as the Alliance capital`s sole defensive fleet. As no actual separate fleets existed - or were needed - prior to the Battle of Dagon - it is certain that it was the first independent force established by the Alliance as it strengthened and expanded its forces to keep the Imperial forces from taking over its territory. It presumably was started from one of the six squadrons which http://anidb.net/ch1030 [Lin Pao] led to victory in the aforementioned battle. In any event, it was formed before the Second Battle of Tiamat. Over the 150 years of the war, the 1st Fleet was, aside from its role as a line of defense for planet Heinessen itself, the main internal military arm to prevent piracy and other space-based crimes. Because of this, the 1st Fleet enjoyed more support than most from the Alliance populace. Although it had, throughout the war, fought in few actual battles, three years of severe attrition had whittled down the Free Planets Star Fleet to only two main, full-strength fleets by 799 UC: the 1st Fleet under Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch740 [Paetta], and the Yang Fleet. With the latter fleet charged with protecting the Alliance from the Iserlohn front, it was the 1st Fleet, as well as the newly-formed 14th and 15th, which formed the core of the 39,600 Alliance ships which fought at the Battle of Rantemario. Following the battle, what battle-ready ships remained were transferred under the command of http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli] during his guerilla-like counterattack, and the 1st Fleet, for all intents and purposes, ceased to exist with the Treaty of Ba‘alat. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Dai 3 Kantai
character.description: The 3rd Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet. By 796 UC, it was commanded by Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch772 [Lefebvre] with the flagship http://anidb.net/ch82271 [Cu Chulainn] and participated in the Alliance invasion of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire]. It was subsequently defeated and destroyed off the planet Lesing by the Wahlen Fleet prior to the Battle of Amritsar, in October of that year. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Dai 5 Kantai
character.description: The 5th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet that existed since at least 745 UC. It fought at the Second Battle of Tiamat in 745 UC under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch77658 [Wallace Warwick], where it fought against the fleets of admirals Wilhelm von Mückenberger and Keit. The battle resulted in a major Alliance victory. It was later commanded by http://anidb.net/ch773 [Alexandre Bewcock] at the Third Battle of Tiamat, in 794 UC, surviving the battle intact. It covered the retreat of the surviving units of Willem Holland`s 11th Fleet after they withdrew from their main attack against the Imperial formation. The 5th Fleet was also led by Vice Admiral Bewcock during the Alliance`s attempted invasion of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] in 796 UC. The 5th Fleet initially fought against the Reuenthal Fleet during the Battle of Bilrost, managing to disengage and withdraw but sustaining 30% casualties. It later took part in the Battle of Amritsar, where it, along with the http://anidb.net/ch96406 [13th Fleet], was able to escape from the area (although at the cost of considerable casualties). Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Quetzalcoatl
character.description: The Quetzalcoatl was the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] flagship of the http://anidb.net/ch96413 [7th Fleet] under Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch774 [Hoghwood]. The Quetzalcoatl participated in the Alliance invasion of Imperial territory in 796 UC. Low on supplies, the 7th Fleet was attacked by the Kircheis Fleet in the Dverger System and encircled. Vice Admiral Hawood accepted Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch187 [Kircheis]` surrender recommendation, and the Quetzalcoatl presumably fell into Imperial hands. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Dai 7 Kantai
character.description: The 7th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet, which was under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch774 [Hoghwood] by 796 UC, who led it from the battleship http://anidb.net/ch96412 [Quetzalcoatl]. It took part in the massive invasion of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] that year, but was surrounded and forced to surrender to High Admiral Siegfried http://anidb.net/ch187 [Kircheis] during the Battle of Dverger. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Dai 8 Kantai
character.description: The 8th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet and was formed some time prior to 745 UC. It played a notable role in the Second Battle of Tiamat under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch77659 [Fang Tchewling]. The 8th Fleet, under the command Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch775 [Appleton], was part of the great Alliance invasion of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] in 796 UC. One of the Imperial planets it occupied was the planet Kleingelt. When the Imperial forces counterattacked after Alliance supply lines were cut, the 8th Fleet was engaged in the Battle of Wansteidt by the Mecklinger Fleet under Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch192 [Ernest Mecklinger]. The 8th Fleet managed to disengage and evade pursuit only after suffering 30% casualties, being one of only three fleets that managed to escape to the Amritsar Starzone relatively intact. At the Battle of Amritsar, the 8th Fleet formed the center of the Alliance line. It came under heavy attack by the http://anidb.net/ch96402 [Black Lancers] during the battle, resulting in the destruction of the flagship http://anidb.net/ch82270 [Krishna] along with Appleton, who went down with the ship. The remnants of the 8th Fleet escaped the battle due to the efforts of the http://anidb.net/ch96406 [13th Fleet] under http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]. Afterwards, the 8th Fleet was disbanded and its survivors assigned to other Alliance units, notably the Iserlohn Garrison Fleet which became known as the Yang Fleet. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Dai 9 Kantai
character.description: The 9th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet that was formed sometime prior to 796 UC. That year, it was under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch776 [Al Salem] during the Alliance invasion of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire]. It fought at the Battle of Alviss against the fleet of http://anidb.net/ch193 [Wolfgang Mittermeyer] and suffered over 50% casualties. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Dai 10 Kantai
character.description: The 10th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet, commanded by Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch777 [Ulanfu]. Under his command the 10th Fleet fought in a number of major battles in the final years of the Alliance–Imperial War. The 10th Fleet was one of the three Alliance fleets engaged at the Third Battle of Tiamat, where it was never in heavy combat, but played a vital role nonetheless in covering the defeated 11th Fleet during its retreat after the 11th`s commanding officer, Vice Admiral Willem Holland, was killed in a perfectly executed Imperial counter attack orchestrated by Imperial Admiral http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm]. The 10th Fleet, like most of the Alliance Star Fleets, later suffered heavy losses during the Alliance invasion of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire]. Before the decisive Battle of Amritsar, the 10th fleet lost half of its combat potential after it was hemmed in and besieged in planetary orbit by Imperial Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch191 [Fritz Joseph Bittenfeld]`s http://anidb.net/ch96402 [Black Lancers]. Outnumbered and desperately low on supplies, 10th Fleet`s position soon became too precarious to maintain, forcing Ulanfu to attempt a forced breakout using the tightly packed spindle formation. Ulanfu was killed leading this attack through the Bittenfeld`s siege formation, and only about 50% of 10th Fleet`s ships escaped successfully. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Dai 11 Kantai
character.description: The 11th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet that was formed sometime prior to 745 UC. During the Second Battle of Tiamat, while under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch77661 [John Drinker Cope], it was instrumental in the destruction of the Imperial Mückenberger Fleet. It played a major role in the Third Battle of Tiamat, in 795 UC, while under the command of Vice Admiral Willem Holland. Holland was an extremely aggressive commander, and trained his fleet to use amorphous tactics to push into the enemy`s ranks while avoiding concentrations of enemy fire. When battle was joined at Third Tiamat, Holland almost immediately ordered 11th Fleet to break ranks and charge the Imperial lines alone, despite being outnumbered roughly four to one by the combined Imperial forces. Holland`s reckless aggression and fluid tactics (described as `artistic` by observers on both sides) were temporarily successful; 11th Fleet got in among the Imperials and caused a great deal of damage and confusion to their main body. However, Holland pressed his attack too fiercely, and refused to take time to regroup his command. Eventually, this led to a temporary halt, and an Imperial counterattack destroyed Holland`s flagship and inflicted significant casualties among the rest of the fleet. The 11th Fleet retreated in disarray with heavy losses, under cover of the 5th and 10th Fleets. It was some time before 11th Fleet could be ready for action again. It did not participate in the Alliance invasion of the Empire in 796 UC likely because it was still rebuilding. (TBT: `Part Two`) However, it did take part in the Alliance Civil War of 797 UC. Its commander and vice commander, Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch800 [Luglanju] and Commodore http://anidb.net/ch809 [Stocks], both pledged allegiance to the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council] after its coup d`état. They subsequently fought against http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]`s Iserlohn Garrison Fleet at the Doria Starzone. During the Battle of Doria, the 11th Fleet was completely defeated, taking 90% casualties. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Abai Geser
character.description: The Abai Geser was the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] flagship of Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch809 [Stocks], and part of the http://anidb.net/ch96433 [11th Fleet]. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Dai 12 Kantai
character.description: The 12th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet which, by 796 UC, was under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch778 [Borodin]. In 796 UC, it took part in the attempted invasion of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire]. The fleet suffered very heavy losses against Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch189 [Cornelius Lutz] during the Battle of Bolthorn, with Borodin committing suicide at the end of the engagement. The surviving ships surrendered to the Imperial Fleet. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Rentenberg Yousai
character.description: The Rentenberg Fortress was a fusion-powered http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Imperial] fortress. During the Imperial Civil War, it was initially occupied by the http://anidb.net/ch6230 [Lippstadt League], but it ultimately fell to forces commanded by Marquis http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm]. Rentenberg was partly built on and into an irregular roughly kidney-shaped asteroid. Although it had a dome-like metallic area on one side, there was no indication of a main gun on the same scale as the Vulture`s Claw and the Thor Hammer of the http://anidb.net/ch1760 [Geiersburg] and http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn] fortresses respectively. Internally, the fortress consisted of numerous passageways tunneled into the asteroid interspersed with a few larger chambers. The fortress had banks of beam turrets in retractable mountings. Due to the irregular shape of the asteroid, there were blind spots in the coverage that were exploited by Admirals http://anidb.net/ch193 [Mittermeyer] and http://anidb.net/ch194 [Reuenthal] to reach service passageways that led to the main fusion reactor powering the whole fortress. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Ameretat
character.description: The Ameretat was an Alliance carrier.

character.name: Langenberg
character.description: The Langenberg was the Imperial flagship of Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch817 [Patolicken]. The Langenberg participated in the Eighth Battle of Iserlohn in 798 UC as part of Admiral Kempff`s fleet. As Patolicken`s flagship, it headed the effort (along with Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch816 [Eihendorf]`s fleet) to rescue the http://anidb.net/ch236 [Müller]`s fleet from an ambush by the http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang]`s fleet. Later in the battle, the Kempf`s fleet was encircled and devastated by enemy fire, and the Langenberg was destroyed. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Ottofried III
character.description: Ottofried III was the 31st kaiser of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire]. As Crown Prince, Ottofried III was very popular, and it was assumed he would make a very capable Kaiser. Ottofried III was known to have simultaneously occupied all 3 military joint chiefs of staff positions when he was Crown Prince. He also held the position of Prime Minister as Crown Prince. After his coronation, the position of Prime Minister was permanently left vacant and taboo in all subsequent reigns (until being filled by http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm]), and its responsibilities taken up by the Minister of State. This was to prevent any subject from following the same path or filling the same position as a Kaiser. Unfortunately, after Ottofried III assumed the throne, a number of conspiracies against the Empire occurred. Most of these conspiracies failed, but they led Kaiser Ottofried III to become extremely paranoid. So fearful was he of assassination, he married 4 different women as Kaiserin and changed his designated heir 5 times. It is unknown what happened to his wives after they were divorced, or his sons after they were disowned. It is likely they were either exiled, imprisoned or executed. Kaiser Ottofried III died a lingering death, hardly consuming any food, for fear it might have been poisoned. Source: Gineipaedia

character.name: Rocinante
character.description: The Rocinante was a http://anidb.net/t2322 [Phezzani] ship, captained by http://anidb.net/ch966 [Bomel], that carried http://anidb.net/ch225 [Erwin Josef II] and his caretakers to Heinessen in 798 UC. Source: Gineipaedia
